solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--        public boolean isPowerOfFour(int num) {--newline--            return num > 0 && (num&(num-1)) == 0 && (num & 0x55555555) != 0;--newline--            //0x55555555 is to get rid of those power of 2 but not power of 4--newline--            //so that the single 1 bit always appears at the odd position --newline--        }--newline--}
